hero.title: Welcome to Our Virtual Care Services
hero.subtitle: Providing quality care from the comfort of your home.

features.title: Affordable Options
features.description: Cost-effective solutions for your healthcare needs.

questions.question: What services do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer virtual consultations, prescription refills, and more.

questions.question: How do I schedule an appointment?
questions.answer: Click on 'Get Started' to book your appointment online.

questions.question: Is my information secure?
questions.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption to protect your data.
